Description: Small rectangular fragment of a green marble tile; polished on both sides; possibly an intrusion from a nearby building of Roman or Late Antique date.
Excavator/field collector: Excavated by: Turner Bequest Excavations, Curium
Curator's comments: Fragments of glass (not kept) also found in this tomb according to the Notebook, one stated to be of Roman date.
Bibliographic references: Murray, Smith and Walters 1900 / Excavations in Cyprus (p.82, Tomb 11 no. 1)
